p.s: A package to read the schema and views in html from a Microsoft Infopath file
p.d:
*DISCLAIMER* The current release is alpha and unstable. This release is for testing only. Do not expect the API to remain unchanged in subsequent releases.
Microsoft Infopath is an Office application that provides form design and submission capabilities designed to compete with the likes of PDF forms. Infopath stores it's forms and data in XML, XSD and XSL archived in the Microsoft Cabinet file format.
